alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Licking (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 7:21PM EDT until May 07 at 7:00AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers... South Fork Licking River below I 70 near Buckeye Lake. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...South Fork Licking River below I 70 near Buckeye Lake. * WHEN...From this evening to Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 880.0 feet, Water extends onto the 129A exit ramp from eastbound Interstate 70 to Route 79 near Buckeye Lake. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM EDT Friday the stage was 880.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 880.2 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 880.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
